mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSINFSGMT (ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, LOANTIMELIMCAT, LOAFRM, ACTINVEST, FUNDSOU, ASSETTRANDFLAG,REPORTFLAG) values (#{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BusiLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BusiDtlLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OpenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AcctCredLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LoanAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RepayMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RepayFreqcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ApplyBusiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{GuarMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OthRepyGuarWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LoanTimeLimCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LoaFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ActInvest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FundSou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AssetTrandFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSINFSGMT set BUSILINES = #{BusiLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSIDTLLINES = #{BusiDtlLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENDATE = #{OpenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CY = #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTCREDLINE = #{AcctCredLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANAMT = #{LoanAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{Flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUEDATE = #{DueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYMODE = #{RepayMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYFREQCY = #{RepayFreqcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLYBUSIDIST = #{ApplyBusiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARMODE = #{GuarMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHREPYGUARWAY = #{OthRepyGuarWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANTIMELIMCAT = #{LoanTimeLimCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAFRM = #{LoaFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTINVEST = #{ActInvest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNDSOU = #{FundSou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSETTRANDFLAG = #{AssetTrandFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAGRAPHDEL = #{ParagraphDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, LOANTIMELIMCAT, LOAFRM, ACTINVEST, FUNDSOU, ASSETTRANDFLAG,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSINFSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSINFSGMTm (ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, LOANTIMELIMCAT, LOAFRM, ACTINVEST, FUNDSOU, ASSETTRANDFLAG,ReportFlag,etl_date ) select ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, LOANTIMELIMCAT, LOAFRM, ACTINVEST, FUNDSOU, ASSETTRANDFLAG,'0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSINFSGMT where ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
